Helper for Proposition 4.7.14: floor-bracketing Unknown identifier `x`x between consecutive 32 ^ {-sorry} : 32^failed to synthesize Singleton Hint: Additional diagnostic information may be available using the `set_option diagnostics true` command.{-Unknown identifier `m`m}-mesh points.

lemma helperForProposition_4_7_14_gridBracket_by_floor (x : ) (m : ) : let j : := Int.floor (x * (32 : ) ^ m) let a : := (j : ) / ((32 : ) ^ m) let b : := ((j + 1 : ) : ) / ((32 : ) ^ m) a x x < b b - a = 1 / ((32 : ) ^ m) := by dsimp set p : := (32 : ) ^ m have hp_pos : 0 < p := by dsimp [p] positivity have hfloor_le : ((Int.floor (x * p) : ) : ) x * p := by exact Int.floor_le (x * p) have hlt_floor_add : x * p < ((Int.floor (x * p) : ) : ) + 1 := by exact Int.lt_floor_add_one (x * p) have ha_le : ((Int.floor (x * p) : ) : ) / p x := by exact (div_le_iff hp_pos).2 (by simpa [mul_comm, mul_left_comm, mul_assoc] using hfloor_le) have hx_lt_b : x < (((Int.floor (x * p) + 1 : ) : ) / p) := by have hlt' : x * p < (((Int.floor (x * p) + 1 : ) : )) := by simpa [Int.cast_add, Int.cast_one, add_assoc, add_comm, add_left_comm] using hlt_floor_add exact (lt_div_iff hp_pos).2 hlt' have hsub : (((Int.floor (x * p) + 1 : ) : ) / p) - (((Int.floor (x * p) : ) : ) / p) = 1 / p := by have hcast_add : (((Int.floor (x * p) + 1 : ) : )) = ((Int.floor (x * p) : ) : ) + 1 := by simp rw [hcast_add] ring exact ha_le, hx_lt_b, by simpa [p] using hsub

Helper for Proposition 4.7.14: ratio identity 8 ^ sorry / 32 ^ sorry = 1 / 4 ^ sorry : Prop(8^Unknown identifier `m`m)/(32^Unknown identifier `m`m) = 1/(4^Unknown identifier `m`m).

Helper for Proposition 4.7.14: a lower bound on numerator and an upper bound on distance imply a large secant quotient.

Helper for Proposition 4.7.14: differentiability at Unknown identifier `x`x forces eventual boundedness of punctured-neighborhood secant quotients.

lemma helperForProposition_4_7_14_eventual_secant_bound_of_differentiableAt (x : ) (hf : DifferentiableAt scaledCosineSeriesFunction x) : y in nhdsWithin x (({x} : Set )), |((scaledCosineSeriesFunction y - scaledCosineSeriesFunction x) / (y - x))| |deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x| + 1 := by have hslope : Filter.Tendsto (slope scaledCosineSeriesFunction x) (nhdsWithin x (({x} : Set ))) (nhds (deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x)) := by simpa [nhdsWithin, Set.compl_singleton_eq] using hf.hasDerivAt.tendsto_slope have hnear : y in nhdsWithin x (({x} : Set )), |(slope scaledCosineSeriesFunction x y) - deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x| < 1 := by have hball : Metric.ball (deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x) 1 nhds (deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x) := Metric.ball_mem_nhds _ (by norm_num) have hdist := hslope hball filter_upwards [hdist] with y hy simpa [Metric.mem_ball, Real.dist_eq] using hy filter_upwards [hnear] with y hy set q : := slope scaledCosineSeriesFunction x y have htri : |q| |q - deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x| + |deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x| := by set d : := deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x have hdecomp : q = (q - deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x) + deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x := by ring have htri' : |(q - deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x) + deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x| |q - deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x| + |deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x| := abs_add_le _ _ have habs : |q| = |(q - deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x) + deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x| := congrArg abs hdecomp exact habs.trans_le htri' have hlt : |q| < |deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x| + 1 := by linarith [htri, hy] have hslope_def : slope scaledCosineSeriesFunction x y = (scaledCosineSeriesFunction y - scaledCosineSeriesFunction x) / (y - x) := by simpa using (slope_def_field scaledCosineSeriesFunction x y) simpa [q, hslope_def] using le_of_lt hlt

Helper for Proposition 4.7.14: choose a scale Unknown identifier `m`m making 32 ^ {-sorry} : 32^failed to synthesize Singleton Hint: Additional diagnostic information may be available using the `set_option diagnostics true` command.{-Unknown identifier `m`m} tiny and 8 ^ sorry / 2 : (8^Unknown identifier `m`m)/2 larger than a prescribed bound.

Proposition 4.7.14: for (encoded here as scaledCosineSeriesFunction : scaledCosineSeriesFunction from Definition 4.7.4), Unknown identifier `f`f is nowhere differentiable on : Type; i.e., for every , Unknown identifier `f`f is not differentiable at Unknown identifier `x`x.

theorem scaledCosineSeries_nowhere_differentiable (x : ) : DifferentiableAt scaledCosineSeriesFunction x := by intro hf have hBoundedSecants : y in nhdsWithin x (({x} : Set )), |((scaledCosineSeriesFunction y - scaledCosineSeriesFunction x) / (y - x))| |deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x| + 1 := helperForProposition_4_7_14_eventual_secant_bound_of_differentiableAt x hf rcases helperForProposition_4_7_2_radius_from_eventually_punctured x hBoundedSecants with , h_pos, h_local let C : := |deriv scaledCosineSeriesFunction x| + 1 rcases helperForProposition_4_7_14_choose_m_against_delta_and_C h_pos C with m, hm_one, hm_small, hm_large rcases helperForProposition_4_7_14_exists_large_local_secant x m hm_one with y, hy_pos, hy_dist_le, hy_slope_large have hy_dist_lt : |y - x| < := lt_of_le_of_lt hy_dist_le hm_small have hy_slope_bounded : |((scaledCosineSeriesFunction y - scaledCosineSeriesFunction x) / (y - x))| C := by simpa [C] using h_local y hy_pos, hy_dist_lt linarith [hm_large, hy_slope_large, hy_slope_bounded]
